website_summaries.verdict: A large foam climber set that's great for toddlers as well as preschoolers.
pros: Includes a slide, large wedge, tunnel, steps, mailbox, and corner pieces
Features fun, bright colors and is very sturdy
The bigger pieces mean this set can be used by toddlers up to kids ages 4 to 5
cons: Pieces don't Velcro together and sometimes slide around

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one year old twins bday.. It is too big for a one year old.. However, they LOVE IT! I think it will suit them better between the ages of 18 months to 3 years. I am happy with the quality. I opted for a larger set they could grow into. A few of the pictures show product being used by a 4 year old. The 4 year old is having fun with it as well. Tunnel is way to small as mentioned in a previous review! Pictures show product size compared to 1 year old and 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Symply Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous in Everyway and Safely Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: We love this! This is the best toddler toy we've purchased. Every day he is on it multiple times. He calls it his "yes-yes yes!" It is so well made and adaptable. I love that it can change every day. It's been great for his coordination. I am so pleased that it's safely made in the USA too. There is a lot of everyday contact with these surfaces. This is a win-win. I highly recommend Foamnasium Adventure Playset!
customer_reviews.author: HHH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good! Tunnel is tiny.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these because several reviews said this brand falls apart quickly. I've only had the pieces for a few months, but they've been great for my 15-month old. Plus, they're more affordable than the other brands! Be aware that the tunnel is tiny. My baby can't even remotely fit into it. It looks like it is sized for a newborn, which is pretty dumb. But my baby doesn't seem to mind that she can't use the tunnel. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P.

customer_reviews.title: My kids loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. It’s really expensive for what it is. But my baby has hypotonia so I’m hoping climbing and playing on this helps build his muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney McMullin

customer_reviews.title: This was great however there are no velcro attached to keep them ...
customer_reviews.text: Searched hard for one of these for my infant room that was not so expensive as they tend to be. This was great however there are no velcro attached to keep them together and from sliding around. Easy fix I picked up velcro and did it myself. Worth saving money
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!!! My young toddlers climb and play on it everyday! Great for winter indoor play or everyday play! They climb, rearrange and roll balls and cars along ramps. Hours of fun worth the cost! So far holding up great and easy to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This was their favorite Christmas gift! After months They’re still playing with them! 18 month old and 4year old. They move them to climb on the couch as well. Perfect height to the couch! The flat pieces just get in the way here. I’m sure there is a use for them, but we don’t use them much. We also flip the U shaped one over and they use it as a chair. If I had a bigger living room we would get another set!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 sets of Foamnasium blocks and my kids love them!!! Best purchase we’ve ever made for our kids by far. We’ve had our first set for 3 years now w SO much use and they are in perfect conduction. This particular set we’ve had for a few months now. They have such a blast w it and all the kids that come over love playing on all these blocks!! Very highly recommend this and other foamnasium products
customer_reviews.author: Nate N.

customer_reviews.title: Small, light, dont stay put!
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than expected, was thinking these blocks would be heavier like the ones we have used at play centers. I also expected this set to be quite a bit bigger. Its small for my 3 year old. Also, slides around all over... The pieces dont stay together! Wouldnt buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Isn't as big as it looks/I thought
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the pictures it looks bigger than it actually is. So i was disappointed when I put it together and it wasn't as big as I hoped but it was the perfect size for my daughter and her room, so its great. For the price I still do wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: worht it
customer_reviews.text: This was the best idea for rainy days and during the winter. It takes up roughly 5' x 5' of room, but it keeps your kids entertained for long periods of time. We move the shapes and make "make-believe" space ships, cars and forts. Cleaning is easy - just use a Clorox or Lysol wipe on the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Indysizeif27

customer_reviews.title: Super unhappy. We ordered this for my super active ...
customer_reviews.text: Super unhappy. We ordered this for my super active 18 month old. We looked at a ton of options and finally picked this one. I was actually glad we got it when we did because the next day it went up in price by over $50. When it finally arrived I was disappointed to find that it only had 5 of the 7 pieces. Amazon told me the only option was to return it, and order it again at the new inflated price. I couldn't be more unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Katy C.

customer_reviews.title: great climbing toy
customer_reviews.text: this has really helped my kiddo with his gross motor skills. Bought it for his second Xmas. Now about to start baby number 2 on it. Has also held up well to their cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Kids got this for Christmas and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids got this for Christmas and love it!! Enough pieces to allow them to make different forts. Perfect size for a 5 year old and 18 month old to play with! We got Velcro so the pieces will stay together because surprisingly they didn't have it! But that was an easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Thiele

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with my purchase. My 2.5 yr old toddler LOVES this and my infant likes trying to climb the steps and flip over the small hump piece. It's very sturdy and soft and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Some people say these are small but they seem big ...
customer_reviews.text: Some people say these are small but they seem big to me. They are a bit big for my 7 month old (daycare must have a smaller version).
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 1 year olds
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. One of the zipper seams ripped from the fabric somehow. Easy to clean and after 6 months, the kids still play on it daily
customer_reviews.author: Eric Krumin

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, and takes only seconds to set up. The baby likes it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Al Maher

customer_reviews.title: Grand Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and would rate a 5 if it came with VELCRO to hold the pieces in place. I added the Velcro myself to make sure my 1 year old grandkids wouldn’t get hurt due to pieces separating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: i have a 10 month old and he likes it. a lot of people say the mailbox is pointless but my son pushes it around and climbes over it. It is one of the smaller pieces but it's still usable. I bought this when it was 325ish. It is a little pricey for it. Right now it is almost 500. I would say it is definitely not worth that price when you can get a lot more pieces and build your own foamnasium for way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cowgill

customer_reviews.title: 🌟Highly recommend!🌟 My little boy loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves this soft gym. He lays on it, plays on it, rolls around and jumps on it. 💝 It is absolutely perfect. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old loves to climb on this! ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves to climb on this! I only wish it had Velcro to keep the pieces attached as it does tend to separate when she crawls on it. especially on a wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Drake

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever for our 1 year old son. He has a blast on it climbing and sliding down. He picks the different pieces up and moves them around the room. I recommend a foam mat underneath for hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're just what he were looking for! Our daughter has a significant motor delay and these work perfectly for her during therapy sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Jess5377

customer_reviews.title: Great foam set
customer_reviews.text: Great foam set. My 16 month old loves it. Warning: the tunnel is tiny! We ended up buying the separate big green square and blue tunnel because my son could not fit in the tunnel that comes with this set. Also, you will need to Velcro the pieces together to keep them from separating. The anti-skid fabric is nice but doesn't keep the pieces in place.
customer_reviews.author: H.M. Zell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Our son is special needs and these are great for sensory play.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: My 12 month old loves these, the tunnel is ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old loves these, the tunnel is way to small but when used upside down she can climb all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a birthday present for my one year old and she loves them. They hold up well to older children too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Krall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 yr old LOVES it! Wish I'd gotten it earlier. They do move around, but not a big deal--he actually likes moving the pieces around.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is holding up well and well made. It is expensive but my kids use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I have a gymnastics mat for my other girls which is nice to make it safer
customer_reviews.text: When I was first looking at these I thought they way over priced. My one year old loves this set though! It was worth it, she gets lots of exercise. I have a gymnastics mat for my other girls which is nice to make it safer. And the tunnel is a seat, way to small for any child to fit though but is just as fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great play set for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great play set for my son. Got it for him when he was roughly 11 months. He is now 17 months and plays with it more and more as he ages. I would say it’s best for infants/toddlers that are walking. The tunnel block is a bit small for him to crawl under. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Livewire

customer_reviews.title: Hard to deliver item
customer_reviews.text: Getting this item delivered to your home is a nightmare, tried it twice and both times it failed. I just got my money back instead and bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that it’s to easy for the infants to move around and it’s not worth the money I paid for it. It’s to light and I don’t think it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Toddler must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it! Very nice size and great quality! I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. They are bigger than i thought reading ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. They are bigger than i thought reading the reviews. Good amount of pieces, price is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam only received one piece out of the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: jason weimer

customer_reviews.title: My husband enjoys the easy placed foot stools
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! She's 11 months now, but we got it for her at 9 months. She crawls all over it! My husband enjoys the easy placed foot stools.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leigh Lewellyn

customer_reviews.title: However it is good for one year olds
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. However it is good for one year olds. I wish it had Velcro to keep the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Zacharski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! just a little pricy or there would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 boys for Christmas. It is well built and seems very durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Griswold

customer_reviews.title: They love it! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters, ages 4 and 1-1/2. They love it! Unfortunately, one piece was missing in the order, the yellow log-shaped piece. I'm trying to deal with that, but ended up on the review page.
customer_reviews.author: Linda NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1yr old it is the perfect size for her and she can't stop climbing, I would assume it would work for her til she is close to 3 would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Wish the pieces would attach together
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves it but it's kind of dangerous because the pieces slip away from each other
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged brand new out of box
customer_reviews.text: Part of the Product came damaged out of box. Very disappointing. Pictures to support claim.
customer_reviews.author: John marro

customer_reviews.title: Our infants love it easy to play and we got a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Our infants love it easy to play and we got a lot of fun games thank you nice product :)
customer_reviews.author: Naima Hassan

customer_reviews.title: kids love it but after only 3 months it is ripping ...
customer_reviews.text: kids love it but after only 3 months it is ripping at the seams with only toddlers with no shoes . woill search for better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20 month old, I did expect it to be bigger but it's still very nice. Seems to be made of durable material and looks like it will last is a while! The tunnel is pretty small though, I wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Where is the rest of it?
customer_reviews.text: We received only one of the pieces (the slide) and I can't inquire about the missing pieces without setting up a return. Help!
customer_reviews.author: Staci S.

product_meta.title: Foamnasium Adventure Playset
product_meta.description: Style:Adventure PlaysetThe Foamnasium adventure playset includes a wedge slide, jumbo wedge, two corner pieces, toddler step, tunnel, and mailbox. A truly diverse set, the adventure lives up to its name!
feature_bullets: Includes a Block Slide, a Large Wedge, a Tunnel, a Mailbox, a Toddler Step, and Two Corner Pieces
Encourages active play, creativity, and fun for your child
Durable, easy-to-clean vinyl cover stands up to countless hours of play
Completely free of any harmful chemicals, odors, lead, and phthalates
Each piece is antimicrobial and meets the flammability requirements of the California Bureau of home furnishings technical bulletin 117-2013

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars193 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
